thread.title: Yash's clash with SRK, Ranveer Singh
thread.title_full: Yash's clash with SRK, Ranveer Singh - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Yash's clash with SRK, Ranveer Singh
text:
Rocking Star Yash is all set to attempt to repeat the success of his 2014 Christmas release Mr & Mrs Ramachari this year with Masterpiece, which is set to see a Christmas release this year. But battling it out at the BO with namma Yash will be Bollywood biggies Shah Rukh Khan and Ranveer Singh.
SRK's Dilwale and and Ranveer's Bajirao Mastani are both eyeing Christmas releases, but will these Bollywood stars manage to attract more cinema-goers than Yash? Only time will tell. What this space for more... Stay updated on the go with Times of India News App. Click here to download it for your device.
